select cast(a.rn as char) as rn ,a.str_id ,a.str_nm ,a.usr_id ,a.usr_nm ,a.ord_no ,a.ord_amt ,a.ord_dt from ( select @rnum := @rnum + 1 as rn ,a.str_id ,a.str_nm ,a.usr_id ,a.usr_nm ,a.ord_no ,a.ord_amt ,date_format(a.ord_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as ord_dt from ( select a.str_id ,b.str_nm ,a.usr_id ,c.usr_nm ,a.ord_no ,a.ord_amt ,d.ord_dt from ( select a.str_id ,a.usr_id ,a.ord_no ,sum(a.ord_amt) ord_amt from ( select a.str_id ,a.lcs_id ,a.usr_id ,a.ord_no ,b.gds_id ,b.ord_cnt*b.ord_amt ord_amt from tb_shpord001 a, tb_shpord002 b where a.ord_no = b.ord_no and a.usr_id = #usrId# )a where 1=1 group by a.str_id ,a.usr_id ,a.ord_no )a , tb_malstr001 b, tb_cmnusr001 c, tb_shpord001 d where a.str_id = b.str_id and a.usr_id = c.usr_id and a.ord_no = d.ord_no
DATE_FORMAT(d.ord_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') between #stOrdDt# and #endOrdDt#
a.ord_no like '%$scOrdNo$%'
a.ord_amt between #stOrdAmt# and #endOrdAmt#
c.usr_nm like '%$scUsrNm$%'
a.usr_id like '%$scUsrId$%'
b.str_id = #scStrId#
) a, ( SELECT @rnum := 0 ) c order by rn desc, ord_dt desc ) a where 1=1 limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

select count(1) totCnt from ( select a.str_id ,a.usr_id ,a.ord_no ,sum(a.ord_amt) ord_amt from ( select a.str_id ,a.lcs_id ,a.usr_id ,a.ord_no ,b.gds_id ,b.ord_cnt*b.ord_amt ord_amt from tb_shpord001 a, tb_shpord002 b where a.ord_no = b.ord_no and a.usr_id = #usrId# )a where 1=1 group by a.str_id ,a.usr_id ,a.ord_no )a , tb_malstr001 b, tb_cmnusr001 c, tb_shpord001 d where a.str_id = b.str_id and a.usr_id = c.usr_id and a.ord_no = d.ord_no
DATE_FORMAT(d.ord_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') between #stOrdDt# and #endOrdDt#
a.ord_no like '%$scOrdNo$%'
a.ord_amt between #stOrdAmt# and #endOrdAmt#
c.usr_nm like '%$scUsrNm$%'
a.usr_id like '%$scUsrId$%'
b.str_id = #scStrId#

select cast(a.rn as char) as rn ,a.str_id ,a.str_nm ,a.usr_id ,a.usr_nm ,a.ord_no ,a.lcs_id ,a.ord_dt ,a.ord_cnt ,a.ord_amt ,a.gds_id ,a.gds_nm ,a.ord_dt from ( select @rnum := @rnum + 1 as rn ,a.str_id ,b.str_nm ,a.usr_id ,a.usr_nm ,a.ord_no ,a.lcs_id ,a.ord_cnt ,a.ord_amt ,a.gds_id ,c.gds_nm ,DATE_FORMAT(a.ord_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as ord_dt from ( select a.str_id ,a.ord_no ,a.lcs_id ,a.usr_id ,d.usr_nm ,b.ord_cnt ,b.ord_amt ,a.ord_dt ,b.gds_id from tb_shpord001 a, tb_shpord002 b, tb_malstr004 c, tb_cmnusr001 d where a.ord_no = b.ord_no and a.usr_id = b.usr_id and a.str_id = b.str_id and b.str_id = c.str_id and a.usr_id = c.usr_id and a.usr_id = d.usr_id and a.usr_id = #usrId# )a, tb_malstr001 b, tb_malgds001 c, ( SELECT @rnum := 0 ) d where a.str_id = b.str_id and a.gds_id = c.gds_id and a.ord_no = #ordNo# and a.usr_id = #usrId# and a.str_id = #strId#
DATE_FORMAT(a.ord_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') between #stOrdDt# and #endOrdDt#
a.gds_id = #scGdsId#
order by rn desc, a.ord_dt desc )a where 1=1 limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

select count(1) totCnt from ( select a.str_id ,a.ord_no ,a.lcs_id ,a.usr_id ,d.usr_nm ,b.ord_cnt ,b.ord_amt ,a.ord_dt ,b.gds_id from tb_shpord001 a, tb_shpord002 b, tb_malstr004 c, tb_cmnusr001 d where a.ord_no = b.ord_no and a.usr_id = b.usr_id and a.str_id = b.str_id and a.usr_id = c.usr_id and a.usr_id = d.usr_id and a.usr_id = #usrId# )a, tb_malstr001 b, tb_malgds001 c, ( SELECT @rnum := 0 ) d where a.str_id = b.str_id and a.gds_id = c.gds_id and a.ord_no = #ordNo# and a.usr_id = #usrId# and a.str_id = #strId#
date_format(a.ord_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') between #stOrdDt# and #endOrdDt#
a.gds_id = #scGdsId#
